mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_comment( board_sid, content, member_sid, delete_yn, created_date, modified_date ) VALUES ( #{board_sid}, #{content}, #{member_sid}, 'N', NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT TC.*, TM.nick_name AS writer FROM tb_comment AS TC LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS TM ON TC.member_sid = TM.member_sid WHERE TC.delete_yn = 'N' AND board_sid = #{board_sid} ORDER BY TC.comment_sid DESC
SELECT TC.*, TM.nick_name AS writer FROM tb_comment AS TC LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS TM ON TC.member_sid = TM.member_sid WHERE TC.comment_sid = #{value}
mapper.delete: UPDATE tb_comment SET delete_yn = 'Y' WHERE comment_sid = #{comment_sid}
